title: Opinionated essay with mixed signal
intent_text: I want to decide quickly if this is worth my time and extract one actionable takeaway.
extracted_text: The essay argues that most productivity systems fail because people over-optimize tools instead of outcomes. It offers a few examples but mostly focuses on opinion. It briefly suggests one concrete practice: define a weekly output goal and reject inputs that do not support it. Beyond that, it does not provide a step-by-step method or measurable checklist.
